description: Entropy thresholds configuration for DevBooks entropy-monitor

complexity_mean.action: Refactor complex functions into smaller units

complexity_p95.action: Review and simplify extremely complex functions

file_lines_p95.action: Split large files into focused modules

function_lines_p95.action: Extract helper functions from long methods

hotspot_ratio.description: Ratio of frequently-changed files (>5 changes in period)

coupling_ratio.description: Ratio of files that change together

churn_ratio.description: Ratio of code added then removed within period

flaky_ratio.description: Ratio of tests with inconsistent results
flaky_ratio.action: Fix or quarantine flaky tests immediately

coverage_min.action: Add tests for uncovered critical paths

test_code_ratio_min.description: Minimum test lines / production lines ratio

outdated_ratio.description: Ratio of dependencies >2 major versions behind

critical.description: Multiple thresholds exceeded or 2x single threshold
